thread.title: Police search for suspects in gun theft
thread.title_full: Police search for suspects in gun theft - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Police search for suspects in gun theft
text:
RUTLAND, Vt. - Police are looking for two suspects after an airsoft rifle was stolen from Dick's Sporting Goods in Rutland Town.
It happened at about 8 p.m. Monday. Police say one man distracted staff while the other hid the weapon on himself in the bathroom.
The suspects are described as white men in their late teens or early 20s. One was wearing black jeans, glasses, a black hooded sweatshirt and dark sneakers, and was last seen carrying two black backpacks.
